scripts.postinstall: find ./notificators/* -name 'package.json' -maxdepth 1 -execdir npm install \; && find ./executors/* -name 'package.json' -maxdepth 1 -execdir npm install \;
scripts.postupdate: find ./notificators/* -name 'package.json' -maxdepth 1 -execdir npm update \; && find ./executors/* -name 'package.json' -maxdepth 1 -execdir npm update \;
